name: Cook Something
desc: You can cook (or bake) something inside! You don't want to do with friends cause they might get in the way...

name: Have a bonfire
desc: This is a fun outdoor activity you can do any time of the year! But you can't do this while it's raining...

name: Go for a hike
desc: This is a great way to get active! You can do this rain or shine, but don't forget a rain jacket if it's raining...

name: Play board games
desc: You can have fun playing a board game inside! But you will need at least one other person to play with you...
